articles.author: Dave Donnelly
articles.title: Shamrock Rovers march on in Europe as excellent Gaffney brace the difference in Albania - The42
articles.description: A Gaffney goal in either half ensured Stephen Bradley’s side made short work of Teuta in stifling heat.
articles.content:
Teuta 0
Shamrock Rovers 2
SHAMROCK ROVERS ARE just 180 minutes from qualification for the group stages of the first-ever Europa Conference League as they eased past Teuta of Albania in Thursday nig… [+3670 chars]

articles.title: Bohemians' brilliant European run comes to an end after PAOK prevail in Greece - The42
articles.description: First-half goals from Stefan Schwab and Diego Biseswar ultimately downed the Gypsies.

articles.author: Gaia Pianigiani
articles.title: Sicily Registers Record-High Temperature as Heat Wave Sweeps Italian Island - The New York Times
articles.description: A monitoring station on the island reported a temperature of 119.84 Fahrenheit, 48.8 degrees Celsius, on Wednesday. If verified, it would be the highest ever recorded in Europe.
articles.content: In recent years we have observed more frequent and more intense heat waves in Italy, Antonello Pasini, a climate change physicist at Italys National Council for Research, said in a phone interview. L… [+1414 chars]
